aboutPage.para1: IM vision is a professional and reliable partner and we are with you all the way from order to execution.
aboutPage.videoError: Your browser does not support the video tag.
aboutPage.para5: LED screens in stock for rental, with our flexible
aboutPage.para6: cabinets you can choose the size of your screen
aboutPage.para7: yourself. We deliver according to your wishes.
aboutPage.para9: in sizes 7-28 sq m for quick
aboutPage.para13: Connection and collaboration without boundaries are essential for progress. At IMvision, we believe that intelligent
aboutPage.para14: solutions are the driving force behind both economic and social development.
aboutPage.para15: With this in mind, IMvision was created as a platform where information flows seamlessly, fostering creativity and innovation. Our goal is to
aboutPage.para16: empower a space—both physical and virtual—where genuine connections can be made, and collaboration thrives, whether offline or
aboutPage.para18: The name IMvision reflects our commitment to intelligent display solutions that bring people together.
aboutPage.para19: We aim to provide advanced,integrated technology to elevate organizational efficiency and enhance
aboutPage.para21: By eliminating barriers to connection, we create environments that inspire innovation, enabling full immersion and sparking new
aboutPage.para22: possibilities for growth. At IMvision, we don’t just rent displays—we help build the future of collaboration.
aboutPage.para23: IM Vision, based in Jönköping, has all of Sweden as a workplace. Our journey started 10 years ago and we have since grown and become a leader in LED screens. We are the small company with the big commitment.
aboutPage.para24: With long and broad experience from LED screens, there are many market-leading companies among our partners, including in the automotive and fitness industry as well as retail chains and arena events.
aboutPage.para25: But we don't want to stop there. We constantly strive to broaden our contact network and to package our offer and delivery in the best way. Maybe you are our new customer?
aboutPage.para26: With us, constant development is the only constant and our goal is to be the best solution in large LED screens. Welcome to IM Vision!

contactUs.para1: Are you ready to make the leap to the ultimate innovation in LED technology?
contactUs.para2: Leave your contact details and our sales team will help you take the first step to discover the power of LED technology in sales & rental.

rentalConditions.heading: Lease agreement
rentalConditions.desc: The lessee must take good care of the equipment. Damage caused by carelessness is charged regardless of whether the damage was caused by fault or accident
rentalConditions.point1: The lessee must take good care of the equipment. Damage caused by carelessness is charged regardless of whether the damage was caused by fault or accident.
rentalConditions.point2: The lessee does not have the right to sell, pledge, transfer or take the equipment out of the country. Nor, in turn, rent or lend the equipment without written consent from IMPROD AB.
rentalConditions.point3: The equipment must, unless otherwise agreed, be picked up and left at IMPROD AB, Hekulesvägen 56 in Jönköping.
rentalConditions.point4: Lately returned equipment is charged according to IMPROD AB rental prices calculated after a 1-day rental per started delayed day.
rentalConditions.point5: The renter is responsible for damage to the rental equipment, theft, etc., and is liable for compensation up to the full value of the equipment as well as other costs incurred by IMPROD AB due to such damage, from the time the equipment leaves IMPROD AB's warehouse until it is returned. This also applies to cases where IMPROD AB arranged/ordered delivery/collection. To the extent that IMPROD AB's own insurance, according to IMPROD AB's assessment, may apply, the lessee is liable for compensation for all costs incurred by IMPROD AB due to such damage, including deductibles agreed in IMPROD AB's insurance.
rentalConditions.point6:: IMPROD AB does not compensate for failed or canceled performances, recordings or the like caused by equipment faults or other circumstances beyond IMPROD AB's control.
rentalConditions.point7: Cancellation of booked equipment and staff must be done no later than two weeks before the start of the rental period. If cancellation occurs later, 50% of the rental amount will be charged. If cancellation is made the day before or on the same day as the start of the rental period, 100% of the rental amount will be charged. For equipment booked but not collected, the agreed rental cost is charged unless otherwise agreed.
rentalConditions.point8: If the lessee does not take into account the above rental conditions, delays the agreed payment, goes bankrupt, ends up insolvent, is declared incompetent, dies or in some other way breaks the rental agreement entered into, IMPROD AB has the right to immediately repossess the equipment and cancel the agreement. In that case, the lessee must pay the rental cost until the day IMPROD AB takes the equipment back.
